ResourceHeader.Description:
High Flux Telescope (HFT): ~0.3-7 MeV protons, 0.4-4 MeV/n He with a small aperture single detector telescope for use in
        very high flux situations
       
        HFT is one of five instruments that make up the COSPIN suite on the Ulysses spacecraft.  HFT was built, and
        primary data analysis is maintained, by National Research Council, Ottawa, Canada

InformationURL.Name: HFT Instrument User Notes
InformationURL.Description: User Notes about the HFT experiment on the Ulysses mission.
